001._comment: #[Open on Sky walking into Area 1. Ravi is hanging around somewhere there and will stay; Usir is standing a few paces from the entrance and will leave after the intro.],
001.name: Usir

002.name: Sky
002.text: Come on, Usir. You didn’t think I’d chicken out on a dare, did you?

003.name: Usir
003.text: Hey, Ravi over there almost did.

004.name: Ravi
004.text: Yeah, because you decided it was a great idea to break into a run-down factory from the lost civilization!

005.name: Ravi
005.text: With weird slimes going around and rumours about monsters!

006.name: Ravi
006.text: That’s not being chicken, that’s being sensible!

007.name: Usir
007.text: Which is another word for being chicken.

008.name: Sky
008.text: You know he’s always like this! And YOU’RE always pushing people around.

009.name: Usir
009.text: Whatever. I’m gonna go deeper in and get the best loot. See you later, losers!

010.name: Sky
010.text: (Why do we even hang out with that guy… I’ll show him.)

012.name: Sky
012.text: Wait, I think it’s just hungry! I have some Crunchy Cake in my pocket…
